bug.short_desc: odb 2.4.0 prevents gcc suite to be upgraded to 6.2.1
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
$ sudo dnf upgrade Last metadata expiration check: 0:03:21 ago on Sat Sep 24 11:49:30 2016. Dependencies resolved. ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Skipping packages with broken dependencies: cpp x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 9.0 M gcc x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 20 M gcc-c++ x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 11 M gcc-gdb-plugin x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 82 k gcc-plugin-devel x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 1.3 M libgomp x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 189 k libquadmath x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 178 k libquadmath-devel x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 36 k libstdc++ x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 447 k libstdc++-devel x86_64 6.2.1-2.fc24 updates 1.8 M libtool x86_64 2.4.6-12.fc24 updates 707 k
Transaction Summary ================================================================================ Skip 11 Packages
$ sudo dnf upgrade --best --allowerasing Last metadata expiration check: 0:03:41 ago on Sat Sep 24 11:49:30 2016. Error: package odb-2.4.0-14.fc24.x86_64 requires gcc = 6.1.1, but none of the providers can be installed
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
See description
Steps to Reproduce:
See description
Actual results:
GCC suite cannot be upgraded
Expected results:
GCC suite can be upgraded
Additional info:
The easiest workaround is to uninstall ODB and rebuild with the source RPM. Once done, it does work fine.

odb-2.4.0-15.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-71839c213c
odb-2.4.0-15.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
